languages.text: "Видите ли, Ваша Светлость... Эти люди хотели напасть..." {n}Блюститель откашливается.{/n} "Докладывает младший лейтенант дворцовой стражи, Элам Вейт. Незадолго до вашего прибытия мы пресекли попытку... покушения на Вольного Торговца. Солдаты дворцовой стражи засекли злоумышленников и вступили с ними в бой".

traits.locale_text: "Так точно!" {n}Голос стражника звучит тверже.{/n} "Докладывает младший лейтенант дворцовой стражи, Элам Вейт. Незадолго до вашего прибытия мы присекли попытку... покушения на Вольного Торговца. Солдаты дворцовой стражи засекли злоумышленников и вступили с ними в бой. По распоряжению губернатора Драйвстема тела злоумышленников должны были оставаться здесь до вашего появления".

languages.text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The warden clears his throat.{/n} "Second Lieutenant of the Palace Guard Elam Weit reporting. Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."
languages.original_text: "Видите ли, Ваша Светлость... Эти люди хотели напасть..." {n}Блюститель откашливается.{/n} "Докладывает младший лейтенант дворцовой стражи, Элам Вейт. Незадолго до вашего прибытия мы пресекли попытку... покушения на Вольного Торговца. Солдаты дворцовой стражи засекли злоумышленников и вступили с ними в бой".

traits.locale_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The guard clears his throat.{/n} "The second lieutenant of palace guard, Elam Weit, reporting. Shortly before your arrival we have stopped the... assassination attempt of the Rogue Trader. The palace guard soldiers have detected the intruders and confronted them in battle."

"You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The guard clears his throat.{/n} "The second lieutenant of palace guard, Elam Weit, reporting. Shortly before your arrival we have stopped the... assassination attempt of the Rogue Trader. The palace guard soldiers have detected the intruders and confronted them in battle."

Shortly before you arrived, we had averted the... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace guard soldiers have detected the intruders and confronted them in battle."

Shortly before you arrived, we had averted the... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace guard soldiers have detected the intruders and confronted them in battle."

Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."

"You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The warden clears his throat.{/n} "Second Lieutenant of the Palace Guard Elam Weit reporting. Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."

languages.text: 「ご覧のとおりです、陛下…襲撃者が現れました…」{n}ワーデンは咳払いをして続ける。{/n}「宮殿警備隊の第2副官、エラム・ウェイトがご報告申し上げます。陛下が到着される直前です…自由開拓者の暗殺計画の警備にあたっていたところ、宮殿兵は侵入者を発見し、戦闘に突入しました」
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The warden clears his throat.{/n} "Second Lieutenant of the Palace Guard Elam Weit reporting. Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."

traits.locale_text: 「ご覧のとおりです、陛下…襲撃者が現れました…」{n}ワーデンは咳払いをして続ける。{/n}「宮殿警備隊の第2副官、エラム・ウェイトがご報告申し上げます。陛下が到着される直前です…自由開拓者の暗殺計画の警備にあたっていたところ、宮殿兵は侵入者を発見し、戦闘に突入しました」

languages.text: “如您所见，大人……这些人想要行刺……”{n}卫兵清了清嗓子，重新开口道。{/n}“宫廷卫队少尉埃兰·维特向您报告。就在您抵达之前，我们刚刚挫败了一场……针对行商浪人的刺杀行动。宫廷卫兵发现了这些入侵者，与他们展开了战斗。”
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The warden clears his throat.{/n} "Second Lieutenant of the Palace Guard Elam Weit reporting. Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."

traits.locale_text: “如您所见，大人……这些人想要行刺……”{n}卫兵清了清嗓子，重新开口道。{/n}“宫廷卫队少尉埃兰·维特向您报告。就在您抵达之前，我们刚刚挫败了一场……针对行商浪人的刺杀。宫廷卫兵发现了这些入侵者，与他们展开了战斗。”

languages.text: « Vous voyez, Votre Seigneurie... Ces gens ont essayé d'attaquer... » {n}Il s'éclaircit la voix.{/n} « Sous-lieutenant de la garde du palais, Elam Weit, au rapport. Peu avant votre arrivée, nous avons déjoué une... tentative d'assassinat visant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Les gardes ont repéré et affronté les intrus pour les mettre hors d'état de nuire. »
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The warden clears his throat.{/n} "Second Lieutenant of the Palace Guard Elam Weit reporting. Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."

traits.locale_text: « Vous voyez, Votre Seigneurie... Ces gens ont essayé d'attaquer... {n}Il s'éclaircit la gorge.{/n} Sous-lieutenant de la garde du palais, Elam Weit, au rapport. Peu avant votre arrivée, nous avons déjoué une... tentative d'assassinat visant {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Les gardes ont repéré et affronté les intrus pour les mettre hors d'état de nuire. »

languages.text: «Verá, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Esa gente quería atacar...». {n}El guardia se aclara la voz.{/n} «Elam Weit, segundo teniente de la guardia de palacio, al habla. Poco antes de que llegara, evitamos el... intento de asesinato {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Los soldados del palacio detectaron a los intrusos y se enfrentaron a ellos».
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The warden clears his throat.{/n} "Second Lieutenant of the Palace Guard Elam Weit reporting. Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."

traits.locale_text: «Verá, mi{mf|lord|lady}... Esa gente quería atacar...». {n}El guardia se aclara la voz.{/n} «Segundo teniente de la guardia de palacio, Elam Weit, al habla. Poco antes de que llegara, evitamos el... intento de asesinato {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente. Los soldados de la guardia del palacio descubrieron a los intrusos y se enfrentaron a ellos».

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Diese Leute hatten einen Angriff auf ..." {n}Die Wache räuspert sich.{/n} "Zweiter Lieutenant der Palastwache Elam Weit erstattet Bericht. Kurz vor Eurer Ankunft haben wir einen ... Attentatsversuch auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} vereitelt. Die Palastsoldaten hatten Eindringlinge entdeckt und sie angegriffen."
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The warden clears his throat.{/n} "Second Lieutenant of the Palace Guard Elam Weit reporting. Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Diese Leute hatten einen Angriff auf ..." {n}Die Wache räuspert sich.{/n} "Zweiter Lieutenant der Palastwache Elam Weit erstattet Bericht. Kurz vor Eurer Ankunft haben wir den ... Attentatsversuch auf {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} vereitelt. Die Soldaten der Palastwache haben die Eindringlinge entdeckt und im Kampf gestellt."

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, şöyle ki... Bu şahıslar saldırmak maksadıyla..." {n}Dizdar, boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Saray Muhafızları Teğmeni Elam Weit, emredersiniz! Siz gelmeden hemen önce... Zatıaliniz Hür Tacir'e yönelik bir suikast girişimi önlenmiştir. Saray askerleri, mütecavizleri tespit etmiş ve bu şahıslarla çatışmaya girmiştir."
languages.original_text: "You see, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Those people wanted to attack..." {n}The warden clears his throat.{/n} "Second Lieutenant of the Palace Guard Elam Weit reporting. Shortly before you arrived, we averted an... assassination attempt on the Rogue Trader. The palace soldiers detected intruders and engaged them in combat."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, şöyle ki... Bu şahıslar saldırmak maksadıyla..." {n}Dizdar, boğazını temizliyor.{/n} "Saray Muhafızları Teğmeni Elam Weit, emredersiniz! Siz gelmeden hemen önce... zatıaliniz Hür Tacir'e yönelik bir suikast girişimi önlenmiştir. Saray askerleri, mütecavizleri tespit etmiş ve bu şahıslarla çatışmaya girmiştir."
